journal.just-arrived: You've got no clue where the train station is. Perhaps wandering around some more will give you a clue.
journal.target-located: A kind ramen shop owner told you that the airport train station is just below the gate you arrived from. Let's!! Going!
journal.found-ticket-booth: You've finally found the ticket booth! Let's buy a ticket.
journal.need-resources: In order to buy a ticket, it seems that you need to collect more money and learn more numbers and colors.
journal.complete: You've successfully purchased a ticket from the airport train station. Tokyo here we come!

need-resources.description: Know a word for a number

journal.found-machine: You feel a bit dehydrated. Maybe you can get a drink from the vending machine.
journal.need-yen: You need to get some yen to feed the machine. Wandering around might give you ideas.
journal.complete: At first, you are tempted by some chocolate in the vending machine, but you remember what you came here for, and buy a drink instead.

journal.found-shop: Maybe Ramen-ya will satiate your hunger.
journal.learn-colors: The blue menu item looks pretty attractive. Maybe you can wander around and figure out how to say blue.
journal.complete: Halfway through slurpring down the ramen, you wonder if blue ramen is safe. You finish it anyways.
